edu.rit.pjmr

Class ReducerTaskConfig<K,V extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.ReducerTaskConfig<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Mapper output key data type.
    V - Mapper output value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class ReducerTaskConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
extends Object
implements Streamable
    Class ReducerTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a reducer task.

    • Method Detail

      • reducer

        public <T extends Reducer<K,V>> ReducerConfig<K,V> reducer(Class<T> reducerClass,
                                                  String... args)
        Add the given Reducer to this reducer task. The argument strings for the reducer, if any, may also be specified. A reducer task may have zero or more reducers. If a reducer task has no reducers, the reducer task should have a Customizer.
        Parameters:
        reducerClass - Reducer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the reducer.
        Returns:
        Reducer config object for reducerClass.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if reducerClass is null.

      • reducer

        public <T extends Reducer<K,V>> ReducerConfig<K,V> reducer(int copies,
                                                  Class<T> reducerClass,
                                                  String... args)
        Add the given number of copies of the given Reducer to this reducer task. The argument strings for the reducers, if any, may also be specified; each reducer has the same argument strings. A reducer task may have zero or more reducers. If a reducer task has no reducers, the reducer task should have a Customizer.
        Parameters:
        copies - Number of copies to add (≥ 1).
        reducerClass - Reducer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the reducers.
        Returns:
        Reducer config object for reducerClass.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if copies < 1.
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if reducerClass is null.

      • customizer

        public <T extends Customizer<K,V>> ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> customizer(Class<T> customizerClass,
                                                            String... args)
        Specify the given Customizer for this reducer task. The argument strings for the customizer, if any, may also be specified. The default is not to use a customizer. If a reducer task has no customizer, the reducer task should have at least one Reducer.
        Parameters:
        customizerClass - Customizer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the customizer.
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if customizerClass is null.

      • threads

        public ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> threads(int threads)
        Specify this reducer task's threads property. For further information, see TaskSpec.threads().
        Parameters:
        threads - Number of threads (≥ 1).
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if threads is illegal.

      • schedule

        public ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> schedule(Schedule schedule)
        Specify this reducer task's schedule property. For further information, see TaskSpec.schedule().
        Parameters:
        schedule - Parallel for loop schedule.
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if schedule is null.

      • chunk

        public ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> chunk(int chunk)
        Specify this reducer task's chunk property. For further information, see TaskSpec.chunk().
        Parameters:
        chunk - Chunk size (≥ 1).
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if chunk is illegal.

      • jvmFlags

        public ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> jvmFlags(String... jvmFlags)
        Specify the JVM flags for this reducer task. For further information, see TaskSpec.jvmFlags().
        Parameters:
        jvmFlags - JVM flags (zero or more).
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if jvmFlags is null or any element of jvmFlags is null.

      • runInJobProcess

        public ReducerTaskConfig<K,V> runInJobProcess()
        Specify that this reducer task must run in the job process. For further information, see TaskSpec.runInJobProcess().
        Returns:
        This reducer task config object.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
